body: With a combination of strange shadow magic and chirurgery, your eyes are permanently modified to see farther in darkness.
name: Gloom Sight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/New Racial Rules/Fetchling Feats/Gloom Sight

sections.body: You gain darkvision 90 ft., but gain the light sensitivity weakness.
sections.name: Benefit
